Mutation Generators (deprecated)

locuaz.abstractmutationgenerator

class locuaz.abstractmutationgenerator.AbstractMutationGenerator(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ABC, Mapping

Deprecated since version 0.7.0: Mutation Generators are replaced by Mutation Creators.

locuaz.spm4

class locuaz.spm4.SPM4(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: AbstractMutationGenerator

SPM4 generates mutations by splitting all amino acids (except CYS) in the following categories: negative, positive, hydrophobic and ring-containing. It will pick 1 amino acid from each category until it generates one for each branch and randomly pick a position for all of them, hence SPM (Single Point Mutation).

Deprecated since version 0.7.0: Mutation Generators are replaced by Mutation Creators.

CAT_AAS: Tuple[Tuple, Tuple, Tuple, Tuple] = (('D', 'E', 'S', 'T'), ('R', 'N', 'Q', 'H', 'K'), ('A', 'G', 'I', 'M', 'L', 'V'), ('P', 'F', 'W', 'Y'))
NEG_AAS: Tuple = ('D', 'E', 'S', 'T')
N_CAT = 4
PHO_AAS: Tuple = ('A', 'G', 'I', 'M', 'L', 'V')
POS_AAS: Tuple = ('R', 'N', 'Q', 'H', 'K')
RIN_AAS: Tuple = ('P', 'F', 'W', 'Y')
excluded_aas: Set[str]
excluded_pos: Set[int]
idx_chain: int
idx_residue: int
mutations: Dict[str, List[Mutation]]
remaining_categories: Set[int]

locuaz.spm4i

class locuaz.spm4i.SPM4i(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: SPM4

overrides __generate_position__(). It uses freesasa to get the interface to prevent mutations on positions that are not in contact.

Deprecated since version 0.7.0: Mutation Generators are replaced by Mutation Creators.

locuaz.spm4mmpbsa

  • gmxmmpbsa based generators like SPM4gmxmmpbsa need a residue decomposition file from gmxmmpbsa, so the gmxmmpbsa script needs to include something along the lines of:

    /
&decomp
idecomp=2, dec_verbose=0,
print_res="within 4"
/
class locuaz.spm4mmpbsa.SPM4gmxmmpbsa(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: SPM4

overrides __generate_position__(). It uses freesasa to get the interface to prevent mutations on positions that are not in contact and also sorts residues according to the binding ΔG, reported by the gmxmmpbsa scoring function

Deprecated since version 0.7.0: Mutation Generators are replaced by Mutation Creators.
